title: Xerath bug ?
body:
I just played a game as Xerath on aram and halfway through the game my q ability stopped working. It may have been after akali or veigar killed me, i'm not sure. I tried binding it to another key and directly clicking on the icon but nothing worked. Has this happened to anyone else? 
Thank you.

replies.body: I find leaving then rejoining game stops issue. Sometimes happens with vi too
This has happened to other people with other champions. It is a bug, and should be reported [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
